concept.name: Detect all threat targets in assigned sector
Neutralize opfor with well aimed fire
Interleave weapon fire with team fires

stateTransition.name: a team members shot missed their target

muzzle flagging performance poor to good

ns4:message.ns4:content: Please fill out the correct report
Think about the information you want to relay back to your Commander: Who, what, when, where and why. Remember to keep it brief!
Target Missed! Remember to make center of mass your point of aim and always Double Tap!
Tell your company SGT you need range time!
You're flagging a team member! Check the position of your muzzle and adjust.

ns4:message.ns4:content: Based on the squads performance in the first room,the system recommends increasing the difficulty of the second room by adding a second enemy to eliminate. To do so, apply the "increase difficulty in second room" strategy now.
